(:action check ; Check a resource and update task status
  :parameters (?npc - agent ?item - object ?location - place)
  :precondition (and
                  (available ?npc)
                  (not (checked ?npc ?item))
                  (at ?npc ?location)
                 )
  :effect (checked ?npc ?item)
)

(:action turn ; Turn on a device and update its state
  :parameters (?npc - agent ?device - object)
  :precondition (and
                  (checked ?npc ?device)
                  (functional ?device)
                  (not (on ?device))
                )
  :effect (and
           (on ?device)
           (using ?npc ?device)
          )
